sqlMap.select: select CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SUP_CUST_ID, CUST_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, CUST_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE from CC_CUST where CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#

SELECT CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SUP_CUST_ID, CUST_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, CUST_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE FROM cc_cust cust where cust.sup_cust_id is null and DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR# and STATE = 1 start with cust.CC_CUST_ID = #custId:DECIMAL# connect by prior cust.sup_cust_id = cust.CC_CUST_ID

SELECT CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SUP_CUST_ID, CUST_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, CUST_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE from cc_cust cust start with cust.cc_cust_id = #ccCustId:DECIMAL# and cust.STATE = 1 connect by prior cust.cc_cust_id = cust.sup_cust_id

select CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SUP_CUST_ID, CUST_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, CUST_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE from CC_CUST where STATE = 1
DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into CC_CUST (CC_CUST_ID, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SUP_CUST_ID, CUST_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_LVL_PATH, CUST_NAME, SHORT_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC, NOTES, STATE) values (#ccCustId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, #supCustId:DECIMAL#, #custCode:VARCHAR#, #orgLevel:DECIMAL#, #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#, #custName:VARCHAR#, #shortName:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #domainName:VARCHAR#, #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#, #notes:VARCHAR#, #state:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update CC_CUST set SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, SUP_CUST_ID = #supCustId:DECIMAL#, CUST_CODE = #custCode:VARCHAR#, ORG_LEVEL = #orgLevel:DECIMAL#, ORG_LVL_PATH = #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#, CUST_NAME = #custName:VARCHAR#, SHORT_NAME = #shortName:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN_NAME_SEC = #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#, NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#

update CC_CUST
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
SC_ORG_NAME = #scOrgName:VARCHAR#
SUP_CUST_ID = #supCustId:DECIMAL#
CUST_CODE = #custCode:VARCHAR#
ORG_LEVEL = #orgLevel:DECIMAL#
ORG_LVL_PATH = #orgLvlPath:VARCHAR#
CUST_NAME = #custName:VARCHAR#
SHORT_NAME = #shortName:VARCHAR#
LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN_NAME = #domainName:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN_NAME_SEC = #domainNameSec:VARCHAR#
NOTES = #notes:VARCHAR#
STATE = #state:DECIMAL#
where CC_CUST_ID = #ccCustId:DECIMAL#
